    • Method Detail

      • displayName

        String displayName()
        Implement this method to add a name for your connector. The specified name is displayed in the "Select Connector Version" drop-down list on the Add/Update Connection page of your connector.
        Returns:
        The displayName string

      • version

        String version()
        Implement this method to add a version for your connector. The specified version is displayed in the "Select Connector Version" drop-down list on the Add/Update Connection page of your connector.
        Returns:
        The version string

      • test

        Map test​(Map<String,​Object> configData,
         Map<String,​Object> data)
  throws ConnectorException,
         InvalidCredentialException,
         InvalidAttributeValueException,
         OperationTimeoutException,
         MissingKeyException
        This method is used to test the connection with the target file system.
        Parameters:
        configData - Contains connection name and action to be performed.
        data - Contains all the connection parameters which is used to call the API of the target file system.
        Returns:
        The map
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - The connector exception
        InvalidCredentialException - The invalid credentials exceptions
        InvalidAttributeValueException - The invalid attribute value exception
        OperationTimeoutException - The operation time exception
        MissingKeyException - The missing key exception

      • getFiles

        Map getFiles​(Map<String,​Object> configData,
             Map<String,​Object> data)
      throws ConnectorException
        Implement this method to download files from the target file system.
        Parameters:
        configData - Contains connection name and action to be performed.
        data - Contains all the connection parameters which is used to call the API of the target file system.
        Returns:
        The map
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - The connection exception

      • putFiles

        Map putFiles​(Map<String,​Object> configData,
             Map<String,​Object> data)
      throws ConnectorException
        Implement this method to upload files to the target file system.
        Parameters:
        configData - Contains connection name and action to be performed.
        data - Contains all the connection parameters which is used to call the API of the target file system.
        Returns:
        The map
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - The connection exception

      • setFileTransferConfig

        void setFileTransferConfig​(FileTransferConfigVo configData)
        Implement this method to define the connection parameters.
        • Define all connection parameters by adding them in configData.getConnectionAttributes() list.
        • Define mandatory connection parameters by adding them in configData.getRequiredConnectionAttributes() list.
        • Define encrypted connection parameters by adding them in configData.getEncryptedConnectionAttributes() list.
        • Add description for connection parameters using configData.setConnectionAttributesDescription(jsonObject.toString())
        Parameters:
        configData - Stores metadata and contains information about configurations required for establishing the connection between the EIC and the target file system.

      • getFileTransferConfig

        FileTransferConfigVo getFileTransferConfig()
        This is for internal use.
        Returns:
        The ConfigData
